IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO SERVE CITIZENS OF WESTERN COLORADO WHO HAVE PHYSICAL, SOCIAL, EMOTIONAL, AND ECONOMIC NEEDS.
IRS990.Description: RESIDENTIAL PROGRAMS - ASSISTED AND INDEPENDENT LIVING COMMUNITIES. OFFERS SKILLED HOMECARE TO HILLTOP'S RESIDENTIAL COMMUNITIES

Activity2.Description: ADULT PROGRAMS OFFERING - DOMESTIC VIOLENCE SERVICES, PROFESSIONAL SERVICES THAT REINFORCES SKILL BUILDING BY OFFERING A VARIETY OF COMPUTER TRAINING EXERCISES AND PRACTICE SPACE; HELPING ADULTS AND YOUTH DEVELOP THEIR CAREERS; THE LIFE ADJUSTMENT PROGRAM GIVES BRAIN INJURED ADULTS THE CHANCE TO RECLAIM INTEGRITY, WHOLENESS AND INDEPENDENCE.

Activity3.Description: YOUTH PROGRAMS - HILLTOP'S YOUTH SERVICES ENCOMPASSES A BROAD RANGE OF YOUTH INITIATIVES AND PROGRAMS. CHILD AND ADOLESCENT SERVICES MIRRORS HILLTOP'S BELIEF IN HUMAN POTENTIAL AND IN YOUTH'S CAPACITY TO WORK THROUGH INTERPERSONAL CHALLENGES AND DIFFICULT TIMES.

ActivityOther.Description: CHILDREN'S PROGRAMS - THE CHILD & FAMILY CENTER PROVIDES ESSENTIAL SERVICES TO MESA COUNTY FAMILIES PROVIDES ESSENTIAL SERVICES TO MESA COUNTY FAMILIES PROVIDES ESSENTIAL SERVICES TO MESA COUNTY FAMILIES PROVIDES ESSENTIAL SERVICES TO MESA COUNTY FAMILIES PROVIDES ESSENTIAL SERVICES TO MESA COUNTY FAMILIES PROVIDES ESSENTIAL SERVICES TO MESA COUNTY FAMILIES
COMMUNITY PROGRAMS - PROGRAMS IN WHICH HILLTOP IS A FISCAL AGENT FOR VARIOUS COMMUNITY PARTNERS.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: NOT A LINE NUMBER REQUIRING AN EXPLANATION.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEWS THE
TAX RETURN IN DETAIL WITH THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER THEN
PRESENTS THE TAX RETURN TO THE FULL BOARD PRIOR TO SUBMITTING
THE RETURN TO THE IRS. THESE PROCEDURES ARE SHOWN IN THE BOARD
MINUTES.
THE BOARD REQUIRES CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORMS TO BE FILLED OUT ANNUALLY.
THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS HAS A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE COMPRISED OF MEMBERS
OF THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD. THESE MEMBERS REVIEW
INFORMATION PROVIDED FROM STATE STATISTICAL DATA TO DETERMINE
THE CEO'S COMPENSATION. THE CEO SETS THE COMPENSATION OF THE PRESIDENT AND CFO
REVIEWING COMPARATIVE DATA FROM OTHER NON-PROFITS THROUGHOUT THE
STATE. THESE SALARY FIGURES ARE ALSO PRESENTED TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE.
DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABE TO ANY INDIVIDUAL OR BUSINESS ENTITY
THAT REQUESTS THEM.
THE AUDIT COMMITTEE IS MADE UP OF VOLUNTEERS FROM THE BOARD OF
DIRECTORS. THEY ARE INVOLVED IN THE SELECTION OF OUR AUDITORS AND MEET
WITH THE AUDIT TEAM DURING THE AUDIT AND IN PRIVATE WITH THE
PRINCIPAL TO DISCUSS MANAGEMENT AND THE INTEGRITY OF THE CFO, CEO, AND
THE ACCOUNTING STAFF. THEY APPRAISE THE FULL BOARD OF ANY CONCERNS
REGARDING THE AUDIT.
